name: Aries
desc: Courageous and energetic, Aries are known for their fiery nature and leadership qualities.

name: Taurus
desc: Reliable, patient, and practical, Taurus individuals value stability and loyalty.

name: Gemini
desc: Adaptable and outgoing, Geminis are known for their versatility and lively communication.

name: Cancer
desc: Emotional and nurturing, Cancer individuals are deeply connected to their family and home.

name: Leo
desc: Confident and charismatic, Leos thrive in the spotlight and are known for their warm personalities.

name: Virgo
desc: Analytical and practical, Virgos are perfectionists who value attention to detail.

name: Libra
desc: Balanced and diplomatic, Libras are peacemakers who seek harmony in all aspects of life.

name: Scorpio
desc: Passionate and resourceful, Scorpios are known for their intensity and strong-willed nature.

name: Sagittarius
desc: Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are known for their free spirit and love for exploration.

name: Capricorn
desc: Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns are ambitious individuals who value hard work.

name: Aquarius
desc: Innovative and independent, Aquarians are forward-thinking and value their individuality.

name: Pisces
desc: Compassionate and intuitive, Pisces are dreamers known for their creativity and empathy.
